name: Herbert West
description: A reanimator, obsessed with bringing the dead back to life. His experiments blur the lines between life and death, with disastrous consequences.

name: Dr. Henry Armitage
description: A university professor who investigates the Cthulhu Mythos and its cultists. He often serves as a witness to the horrors of the looming eldritch apocalypse.

name: Randolph Carter
description: A dreamer and explorer of forbidden dimensions. His fantastical journeys take him to places beyond human comprehension, where he encounters unimaginable entities.
